reviews.text: Only been open a few short days, but I really enjoyed my meal here and thought it was reasonably priced.  I got the gyro (in the pita not the sandwich)...
Had a great experience at gyropolis with my two daughters. Great food, great service, and family friendly. All the food came out hot and quick! Will be back...
